code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{Button,TextField,Typography}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderForm=()=>{const{patientId}=useParams();const[testType,setTestType]=useState("");const[response,setResponse]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:3000/order",{patientId,testType});setResponse(res.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error ordering test:",error);setResponse(error.response?error.response.data:"Error");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:"Create Test Order"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Test Type",value:testType,onChange:e=>setTestType(e.target.value),fullWidth:true,margin:"normal"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",children:"Order"})]}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Response"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(response,null,2)})]})]});};export default OrderForm;
